posts.post_content:
The time has come to let go of the bulk of my Yankees collection. I've decided to refocus a bit and also raise some cash for other needs I'll start with some T204 Ramlys. Prices assume a no-fee method. Shipping included. 

Jack Knight SGC 3- $400 (pending)
Neal Ball SGC 3- $400 (pending)
Norman "Kid" Elberfeld SGC 1.5- $275 (pending)
Red Kleinon (Kleinow) SGC 1.5- $200
Rube Manning (Blank Back) SGC 1- SOLD
Charlie Hemphill (has slice on lower right border, otherwise really nice) SGC 1- SOLD[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210113/acb6deef09555e6a7614705324ecd0ca.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210113/807e8880c7471263b235f42f6615f6f4.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210113/44a44db78ed8d051b44190f04c606c1a.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210113/4b3bf4cd1d5e4c25e5cb8bafc3f9dabd.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210113/595210be8c75d8822c5274cc7b409143.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210113/dd6287530655d0c62a2872a90625e9bf.jpg[/IMG]
